reviewsJson.markdown:
Setup: Magma Clone, Ni200, cotton, 260Celsius

Testing: Cap French Vanilla 6%, steeped 5 days

Description:  

* Smell: Caramel, Heavy dark Vanilla, slight sweetness, creamy
* Taste: Inhale is sweet, and has faint milky vanilla notes.
 The exhale has vanilla, sweet light caramel and a good mouthfeel. The vanilla notes are pretty rich and comparable to the vanilla classic by FA. Very faint wood-notes at the last part of the exahle. The lingering taste is best descriped as vanilla pudding.

Off-flavors: None that i would be aware of.

Throat hit: None, maybe a bit dry  
  
Toughts:  
Mixed at 3% most of the caramel notes vanish and it becomes a creamy vanilla flavour, at 7% it is more like a bavarian cream TFA with heavy vanilla notes. I prefer it mixed at 3% as a standalone.
It would play very nicely with Cap Vanilla Custard.
reviewsJson.author: ihatetoridethebus
reviewsJson.title: French Vanilla
